codeSystems.name: DICOM Controlled Terminology Definitions
codeSystems.description: DICOM Code Definitions (Coding Scheme Designator "DCM" Coding Scheme Version "01")

codeSystems.name: TaskCode
codeSystems.title: Task Codes
codeSystems.description: Codes indicating the type of action that is expected to be performed

codeSystems.name: ActionCardinalityBehavior
codeSystems.title: ActionCardinalityBehavior
codeSystems.description: Defines behavior for an action or a group for how many times that item may be repeated.

codeSystems.name: ActionConditionKind
codeSystems.title: ActionConditionKind
codeSystems.description: Defines the kinds of conditions that can appear on actions.

codeSystems.name: ActionGroupingBehavior
codeSystems.title: ActionGroupingBehavior
codeSystems.description: Defines organization behavior of a group.

codeSystems.name: ActionPrecheckBehavior
codeSystems.title: ActionPrecheckBehavior
codeSystems.description: Defines selection frequency behavior for an action or group.

codeSystems.name: ActionRelationshipType
codeSystems.title: ActionRelationshipType
codeSystems.description: Defines the types of relationships between actions.

codeSystems.name: ActionRequiredBehavior
codeSystems.title: ActionRequiredBehavior
codeSystems.description: Defines expectations around whether an action or action group is required.

codeSystems.name: ActionSelectionBehavior
codeSystems.title: ActionSelectionBehavior
codeSystems.description: Defines selection behavior of a group.

codeSystems.name: ContactPointSystem
codeSystems.title: ContactPointSystem
codeSystems.description: Telecommunications form for contact point.

codeSystems.name: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.title: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.description: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

codeSystems.name: RequestIntent
codeSystems.title: RequestIntent
codeSystems.description: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a request.

codeSystems.name: RequestPriority
codeSystems.title: RequestPriority
codeSystems.description: Identifies the level of importance to be assigned to actioning the request.

codeSystems.name: RequestStatus
codeSystems.title: RequestStatus
codeSystems.description: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a request.

codeSystems.name: ResourceType
codeSystems.title: ResourceType
codeSystems.description: One of the resource types defined as part of this version of FHIR.

codeSystems.name: TaskIntent
codeSystems.title: TaskIntent
codeSystems.description: Distinguishes whether the task is a proposal, plan or full order.

codeSystems.name: TaskStatus
codeSystems.title: TaskStatus
codeSystems.description: The current status of the task.

codeSystems.name: SNOMED_CT
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT (all versions)
codeSystems.description: SNOMED CT is the most comprehensive and precise clinical health terminology product in the world, owned and distributed around the world by The International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO).
codeSystems.http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/valueset-medicati: SNOMED CT Medication As Needed Reason Codes

codeSystems.name: ActionType
codeSystems.title: ActionType
codeSystems.description: The type of action to be performed.

codeSystems.name: IdentifierType
codeSystems.title: identifierType
codeSystems.description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying type of identifier. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging data types CX, PLN, PPN, XCN and XON.

codeSystems.name: ActReason
codeSystems.title: ActReason
codeSystems.description:
A set of codes specifying the motivation, cause, or rationale of an Act, when such rationale is not reasonably represented as an ActRelationship of type "has reason" linking to another Act.

*Examples:* Example reasons that might qualify for being coded in this field might be: "routine requirement", "infectious disease reporting requirement", "on patient request", "required by law".

codeSystems.name: RoleCode
codeSystems.title: RoleCode
codeSystems.description: A set of codes further specifying the kind of Role; specific classification codes for further qualifying RoleClass codes.

codeSystems.name: HCParty
codeSystems.title: BeCdHcParty
codeSystems.description: healthcare party in Belgium.
codeSystems.https://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7-be/core//V: List of health care parties in Belgium

codeSystems.name: BeCommunicationCode
codeSystems.title: BeCommunicationCode
codeSystems.description: Communication codes in Belgium. To define a specific method of communicating. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

codeSystems.name: BeCSCoPrescriberChoice
codeSystems.title: BeCSCoPrescriberChoice
codeSystems.description: Type of intended performer choice

codeSystems.name: BeTempRequestedService
codeSystems.title: BeTempRequestedService
codeSystems.description: Temporary codes for indicating services that can be requested from a Nurse

codeSystems.name: BeTempRequestedServiceDetail
codeSystems.title: BeTempRequestedServiceDetail
codeSystems.description: Temporary codes for indicating service details that can be requested from a Nurse

codeSystems.name: BePrescriptionProposalType
codeSystems.title: BePrescriptionProposalType
codeSystems.description: Prescription Proposal Type. Indicates the type of proposal (new or prolongation) as from the uses cases by NIHDI

codeSystems.name: BePrescriptionStatusReason
codeSystems.title: BePrescriptionStatusReason
codeSystems.description: Status reason for the prescription. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

codeSystems.name: BeTreatmentStatusReason
codeSystems.title: BeTreatmentStatusReason
codeSystems.description: Status reason for the treatment. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

codeSystems.name: BeContrastFluidUse
codeSystems.title: BeContrastFluidUse
codeSystems.description: Whether use of contrast fluid should be considered.

codeSystems.name: Ietf3066
codeSystems.title: Tags for the Identification of Languages
codeSystems.description: Older value from OID registry.  Superceded; see recommendations in BCP-47.
